item.description:
This landmark eatery is famous for serving some of the most delicious authentic German and American cuisine. It features servers in authentic German attire, an accordian player, and genuine German beers in a warm Bavarian atmosphere. A healthy appetite is a prerequisite for dining here!

Go to their website:
eastside restaurant.com
to hear their quirky song and see their menus.

Reservations will be made for 7 pm.

Please RSVP no later than Feb 8th.

11 miles and 15 mins from Hartford.

Directions from Hartford:
I-84 W, merge onto Rte 9 South via exit 39A toward Newington/New Britain.
Take Exit 28A toward downtown New Britain;
Turn Left on E Main St;
Turn Right onto Stanley St.;
Turn Left onto Dwight St.
#131 is restaurant.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Dinner at East Side Restaurant
